Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.resource

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.webapp.resource.AbstractResource
it.unipd.dei.webapp.resource.Recipe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource
public class Recipe extends AbstractResource
Represents the data about a recipe.

  • Constructor Details

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int id, String name, String description, int time_minutes, Difficulty difficulty, String image_url, Date creation_date, int user_id, List<Ingredient> ingredients)
      Creates a new recipe
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the recipe
      name - the name of the recipe
      description - the description of the recipe
      time_minutes - the duration in minutes of the recipe
      difficulty - the difficulty of the recipe
      image_url - the url of the image of the recipe
      user_id - the identifier of the user that inserted the recipe
      ingredients - the list of ingredients rquired by the recipe

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int id, String name, String description, int time_minutes, Difficulty difficulty, String image_url, Date creation_date, int user_id, Boolean approved, List<Ingredient> ingredients)
      Creates a new recipe, with optional parameter approved
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the recipe
      name - the name of the recipe
      description - the description of the recipe
      time_minutes - the duration in minutes of the recipe
      difficulty - the difficulty of the recipe
      image_url - the url of the image of the recipe
      user_id - the identifier of the user that inserted the recipe
      approved - the status of the recipe
      ingredients - the list of ingredients rquired by the recipe

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int id, String name, String description, int time_minutes, Difficulty difficulty, String image_url, Date creation_date, int user_id, String user_name, String user_surname, List<Ingredient> ingredients)
      Creates a new recipe, with optional parameters for user_name and user_surname
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the recipe
      name - the name of the recipe
      description - the description of the recipe
      time_minutes - the duration in minutes of the recipe
      difficulty - the difficulty of the recipe
      image_url - the url of the image of the recipe
      user_id - the identifier of the user that inserted the recipe
      user_name - the name of the user tha inserted of the recipe
      user_surname - the surname of the user that inserted the recipe
      ingredients - the list of ingredients rquired by the recipe

    • Recipe

      public Recipe(int id, String name, String description, int time_minutes, Difficulty difficulty, String image_url, Date creation_date, int user_id, int nLikes, List<Ingredient> ingredients)
      Creates a new recipe, with optional nLikes parameter
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the recipe
      name - the name of the recipe
      description - the description of the recipe
      time_minutes - the duration in minutes of the recipe
      difficulty - the difficulty of the recipe
      image_url - the url of the image of the recipe
      nLikes - the number of likes of the recipe
      ingredients - the list of ingredients rquired by the recipe

    • writeJSON

      protected void writeJSON(OutputStream out) throws Exception
      Description copied from class: AbstractResource
      Performs the actual writing of JSON. Subclasses have to implement this method to provide the actual logic needed for representing the Resource to JSON.
      Specified by:
      writeJSON in class AbstractResource
      Parameters:
      out - the stream to which the JSON representation of the Resource has to be written.
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong during writing.
